header.title: Compare
header.subtitle: Visual comparison showing existing conditions and design interventions side by side.

framing.description: This comparison illustrates how three design interventions -- shade structures, murals, and urban farming -- can be integrated within the same alley space.

before_image.caption: Existing alley conditions used as baseline reference

after_image.caption: Integrated design interventions visualized in Alley 3

continuity_note: These values correspond to what you see in the 3D Digital Twin and Street View imagery. Explore the spatial design to visualize how these changes appear in the modeled environment.
